title: क्या झारखण्ड के मुख्यमंत्री रघुबर दास इंटरव्यू के वक्त नशे की हालत में थे?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: I was clicked while I was rubbing my nose which is a common. I refute all the social media claims which wrongly state that I had covered my nose because of any undesirable smell.@dasraghubar @ceojharkhand pic.twitter.com/o7GzReDRJL
